# EEWS Analyzer MCP Server Project

## Project Overview
Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Earthquake Early Warning System (EEWS) performance analysis. Provides reusable tools for analyzing seismic data and generating performance reports.

## Progress Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [ ] Clarify Project Requirements
- [ ] Scaffold the Project
- [ ] Customize the Project
- [ ] Install Required Extensions
- [ ] Compile the Project
- [ ] Create and Run Task
- [ ] Launch the Project
- [ ] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Project Details
- **Type**: MCP Server (Model Context Protocol)
- **Language**: Python
- **Framework**: FastMCP
- **Purpose**: Reusable EEWS analysis skill for any workspace
